props.activeClass: The active-class applied to children when they are activated.
props.reverseTransition: The transition used when the component is reversing items. Can be one of the [built in transitions](/blazor/styles-and-animations/transitions) or one your own.
props.transition: The transition used when the component progressing through items. Can be one of the [built in transitions](/blazor/styles-and-animations/transitions) or one your own.
props.value: The value used when the component is selected in a group. If not provided, the index will be used.
